headline: Cadence (CDNS) Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of semiconductor design software provider Cadence Design Systems (NASDAQ:CDNS) jumped 9.1% in the afternoon session after the company reported strong second-quarter results that surpassed analyst expectations and raised its full-year financial outlook.

headline: Cadence Design Stock Soars on Earnings. It’s an ‘Essential’ Play on Chips.

headline: Cadence Design Systems Stock Pops as Firm Settles With US, Raises Outlook
summary: Cadence Design Systems was one of the top-performing stocks in the S&P 500 Tuesday after the firm settled legal proceedings with the U.S. government and lifted its full-year outlook.

headline: Cadence to pay $140m fine for illegal tech exports to China
summary: Cadence admitted to violating export controls by selling EDA technology to NUDT, connected to China's military.

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: UnitedHealth, P&G, Spotify, UPS
summary: ↘️ UnitedHealth (UNH): The healthcare conglomerate reinstated its financial guidance, giving an estimate for annual adjusted earnings well below its original forecast. Shares, which have shed more than 40% this year, dropped in premarket trading.
